content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern here https //theturtletrunk com/checkered-basket-crochet-pattern/ and the video tutorial on the turtle trunk youtube channel this checkered basket crochet pattern is perfect for eater basket this crochet basket pattern includes 3 sizes small 5 5 x4 medium 7 x5 and large 8 x6 it features a long handle and checkered design use for holding easter treats yarn or knick knacks or even use as a plant basket difficulty advanced beginner finished sizes small 5 5 x4 medium 7 x5 and large 8 x6 *size can be customized* crochet pattern is written in english only and uses us terminology supplies needed - super bulky 6 weight yarn in 2 colors i used lion brand yarn wool ease thick and quick - 6 5mm k and 8mm l crochet hooks - yarn needle - scissors pattern includes -detailed instructions for a checkered crochet basket in 3 sizes - special stitch instructions - instructions for crochet handles -link to free video tutorial -gauge
